doc.title: 18-80 Puan si maimee sua
doc.plot: Oat is a musician who accompanies his grandfather to a secluded island to look for his long lost love. To their great dismay, they find that she has passed away. As a young man, Oat's grandfather was too shy to ask out his true love, and she married another man. Due to bad weather, the two are unable to leave the island, and Oat winds up meeting Bow, who he believes to be his true love. But he suffers from the same shyness that his grandfather had. Before the storm ends, Oat must find the confidence he needs, or be doomed to the same fate as his grandfather- wondering what could have been...forever.
